name: Introduction to Technical Theater
description: This course introduces students to the fundamentals of Technical Theater, including lighting, sound, and scenic design.

name: Theatre Design & Technology
description: This course covers the basics of designing and constructing theater sets, including drafting, tools, and materials.

name: Theatre Lighting and Sound Design
description: This course covers the basics of designing and operating lighting and sound systems for theatre productions.

name: Advanced Theatre Design & Technology
description: This course covers the advanced concepts of designing and constructing theater sets, including advanced drafting, tools, and materials.

name: Advanced Theatre Lighting and Sound Design
description: This course covers the advanced concepts of designing and operating lighting and sound systems for theatre productions.
